Tests Input.dispatchMouseEvent method for dragging
Drag
-----Event-----
type: mousemove
button: 0
buttons: 1
clientX: 50
clientY: 50
screenX: 50
screenY: 50
-----Event-----
type: mousedown
button: 0
buttons: 1
clientX: 50
clientY: 50
screenX: 50
screenY: 50
-----Event-----
type: mousemove
button: 0
buttons: 1
clientX: 50
clientY: 150
screenX: 50
screenY: 150
-----Event-----
type: dragstart
button: 0
buttons: 1
clientX: 50
clientY: 50
screenX: 50
screenY: 50
-----Event-----
type: drag
button: 0
buttons: 1
clientX: 50
clientY: 150
screenX: 50
screenY: 150
-----Event-----
type: dragenter
button: 0
buttons: 1
clientX: 50
clientY: 150
screenX: 50
screenY: 150
-----Event-----
type: dragover
button: 0
buttons: 1
clientX: 50
clientY: 150
screenX: 50
screenY: 150
Drop
-----Event-----
type: drop
button: 0
buttons: 1
clientX: 50
clientY: 150
screenX: 50
screenY: 150
-----Event-----
type: dragend
button: 0
buttons: 0
clientX: 50
clientY: 150
screenX: 50
screenY: 150

button: 0

screenY: 50
